00043 #ifndef __LST_CONRPC_H__
00044 #define __LST_CONRPC_H__
00045 
00046 #include <libcfs/libcfs.h>
00047 #include <lnet/lnet.h>
00048 #include <lnet/lib-types.h>
00049 #include <lnet/lnetst.h>
00050 #include "rpc.h"
00051 #include "selftest.h"
00052 
00053 /* Console rpc and rpc transaction */
00054 #define LST_TRANS_TIMEOUT       30
00055 #define LST_TRANS_MIN_TIMEOUT   3
00056 
00057 #define LST_VALIDATE_TIMEOUT(t) MIN(MAX(t, LST_TRANS_MIN_TIMEOUT), LST_TRANS_TIMEOUT)
00058 
00059 #define LST_PING_INTERVAL       8
00060 
00061 struct lstcon_rpc_trans;
00062 struct lstcon_tsb_hdr;
00063 struct lstcon_test;
00064 struct lstcon_node;
00065 
00066 typedef struct lstcon_rpc {
00067         struct list_head         crp_link;      /* chain on rpc transaction */
00068         srpc_client_rpc_t       *crp_rpc;       /* client rpc */
00069         struct lstcon_node      *crp_node;      /* destination node */
00070         struct lstcon_rpc_trans *crp_trans;     /* conrpc transaction */
00071 
00072         unsigned int             crp_posted:1;   /* rpc is posted */
00073         unsigned int             crp_finished:1; /* rpc is finished */
00074         unsigned int             crp_unpacked:1; /* reply is unpacked */
00076         unsigned int             crp_embedded:1;
00077         int                      crp_status;     /* console rpc errors */
00078         cfs_time_t               crp_stamp;      /* replied time stamp */
00079 } lstcon_rpc_t;
00080 
00081 typedef struct lstcon_rpc_trans {
00082         /* link chain on owner list */
00083         struct list_head        tas_olink;
00084         /* link chain on global list */
00085         struct list_head        tas_link;
00086         /* operation code of transaction */
00087         int                     tas_opc;
00088         /* features mask is uptodate */
00089         unsigned                tas_feats_updated;
00090         /* test features mask */
00091         unsigned                tas_features;
00092         wait_queue_head_t       tas_waitq;      /* wait queue head */
00093         atomic_t                tas_remaining;  /* # of un-scheduled rpcs */
00094         struct list_head        tas_rpcs_list;  /* queued requests */
00095 } lstcon_rpc_trans_t;
00096 
00097 #define LST_TRANS_PRIVATE       0x1000
00098 
00099 #define LST_TRANS_SESNEW        (LST_TRANS_PRIVATE | 0x01)
00100 #define LST_TRANS_SESEND        (LST_TRANS_PRIVATE | 0x02)
00101 #define LST_TRANS_SESQRY        0x03
00102 #define LST_TRANS_SESPING       0x04
00103 
00104 #define LST_TRANS_TSBCLIADD     (LST_TRANS_PRIVATE | 0x11)
00105 #define LST_TRANS_TSBSRVADD     (LST_TRANS_PRIVATE | 0x12)
00106 #define LST_TRANS_TSBRUN        (LST_TRANS_PRIVATE | 0x13)
00107 #define LST_TRANS_TSBSTOP       (LST_TRANS_PRIVATE | 0x14)
00108 #define LST_TRANS_TSBCLIQRY     0x15
00109 #define LST_TRANS_TSBSRVQRY     0x16
00110 
00111 #define LST_TRANS_STATQRY       0x21
00112 
00113 typedef int (* lstcon_rpc_cond_func_t)(int, struct lstcon_node *, void *);
00114 typedef int (*lstcon_rpc_readent_func_t)(int, srpc_msg_t *,
00115                                          lstcon_rpc_ent_t __user *);
00116 
00117 int  lstcon_sesrpc_prep(struct lstcon_node *nd, int transop,
00118                         unsigned version, lstcon_rpc_t **crpc);
00119 int  lstcon_dbgrpc_prep(struct lstcon_node *nd,
00120                         unsigned version, lstcon_rpc_t **crpc);
00121 int  lstcon_batrpc_prep(struct lstcon_node *nd, int transop, unsigned version,
00122                         struct lstcon_tsb_hdr *tsb, lstcon_rpc_t **crpc);
00123 int  lstcon_testrpc_prep(struct lstcon_node *nd, int transop, unsigned version,
00124                          struct lstcon_test *test, lstcon_rpc_t **crpc);
00125 int  lstcon_statrpc_prep(struct lstcon_node *nd, unsigned version,
00126                          lstcon_rpc_t **crpc);
00127 void lstcon_rpc_put(lstcon_rpc_t *crpc);
00128 int  lstcon_rpc_trans_prep(struct list_head *translist,
00129                            int transop, lstcon_rpc_trans_t **transpp);
00130 int  lstcon_rpc_trans_ndlist(struct list_head *ndlist,
00131                              struct list_head *translist, int transop,
00132                              void *arg, lstcon_rpc_cond_func_t condition,
00133                              lstcon_rpc_trans_t **transpp);
00134 void lstcon_rpc_trans_stat(lstcon_rpc_trans_t *trans,
00135                            lstcon_trans_stat_t *stat);
00136 int  lstcon_rpc_trans_interpreter(lstcon_rpc_trans_t *trans,
00137                                   struct list_head __user *head_up,
00138                                   lstcon_rpc_readent_func_t readent);
00139 void lstcon_rpc_trans_abort(lstcon_rpc_trans_t *trans, int error);
00140 void lstcon_rpc_trans_destroy(lstcon_rpc_trans_t *trans);
00141 void lstcon_rpc_trans_addreq(lstcon_rpc_trans_t *trans, lstcon_rpc_t *req);
00142 int  lstcon_rpc_trans_postwait(lstcon_rpc_trans_t *trans, int timeout);
00143 int  lstcon_rpc_pinger_start(void);
00144 void lstcon_rpc_pinger_stop(void);
00145 void lstcon_rpc_cleanup_wait(void);
00146 int  lstcon_rpc_module_init(void);
00147 void lstcon_rpc_module_fini(void);
